pageContext.claim: “You have bad laws that could be easily changed. Eric, we could fix them in 15 minutes with the Democrats but they don't wanna fix them.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims it would be easy to quickly make a deal -- 15 minutes. But there is relatively little support in Congress for many of his anti-immigration proposals. When the Senate voted in 2018 on different options, Trump's plan received the fewest number of votes, including many Republican "nay" votes.
